name: Alolan Persian
description: The Classy Cat Pokémon. It looks down on everyone other than itself. Its preferred tactics are sucker punches and blindside attacks.

abilities.name: Fur Coat
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon may halve the damage dealt to it from any one attack.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
